sub_title: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead
summary:
Delivering projects on time, on budget, on quality by implementing true software engineering.

Our team has helped customers worldwide to build their IDesign Method Based software systems: Business Design, System Design, Project Design, Detailed Design, and SO-Platform.

Koen is a strong believer in Architecture, Continuous Improvement, Design, Systems Thinking, Planning, Mentorship, and the Team.

projects.title: Brainnet
projects.description:
What started of as a IDesign Mentorship assignment has grown into a great partnership with Brainnet (and my friend Stephan van Eeden).

Covered items:
- Documentation Landscape
- Business analysis
- System Design
- Copper (Microservices Platform)
- Project Design
- Project Tracking
- Development processes

It's is great to work with passionate people.

contributors.headline: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead

projects.title: XADM
projects.description:
XADM (Ilionx Application Development Method) captures the processes to successfully run software projects. As chairman I focus on creating the vision and develop strategic tracks. Key points are identified and discussed with the members of the team. We have a great collaborative team with good mix of different individual interests and strengths. The team consists of 15 highly skilled professionals mainly in the role of architect.

The team works on several products: 
- Copper: microservices platform
- VisioEx: The architect's IDE
- Project design tool

XADM is based on The Method of IDesign and incorporates pieces of EUP, TOGAF, Business architecture and Project management. Iterations are ongoing based on working experiences of the team.

contributors.headline: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead

projects.title: Websoft
projects.description:
The Ilionx Design Team worked with the Websoft team to get a handle on the business requirements for the new system. This system is part of a larger platform that is build based on The Method of IDesign.

During the assignment the key stakeholders of the company were interviewed and a business design was created. This gives the Websoft team a foundation to start the implementation part of the project.

contributors.headline: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead

projects.title: Pharma Insight
projects.description:
Pharma Insight (PI) delivers strategic advice in the life and material sciences industry that enables partners to position their product or service to meet regulatory, market and customer expectation.

The Subject Matter Experts of Pharma Insight have several innovating idea's for this industry. Together with the PI SME team and our Ilionx design team a solution has been designed. In 4 weeks the UX design, system design and project design was completed. 

With this the Pharma Insight team has a clear view on the scope, investment and lead time for their idea's.

contributors.headline: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead

projects.title: ValueMe
projects.description:
As software architect I guide the project from first inception, by scoping it, market research, explore possible realization timelines and options.

Architected the pilot of 2020
- System Design
- Project Design
- Copper platform
- Ionic

contributors.headline: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead

projects.title: gigRonin
projects.description:
gigRonin is a US based startup that aims to provide an eco-system for odd jobs (gigs).

With the gigRonin team we are planning and working on the development of the eco-system. Starting with a fast to market v1 release and a v2 version that is aimed for growth in the future.

contributors.headline: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead

projects.title: Additive Industries - IoT, datawarehouse
projects.description: Additive Industries has a great competitive edge in the world of 3D printing. In this project we helped Roland Smits and Adrie Boverhof define a reference architecture for their IoT, datawarehouse challenge. Thanks to our SME on IoT and dataware housing.

contributors.headline: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead

projects.title: SucSez groep
projects.description: We helped SucSez groep to analyse their existing Business landscape. This is the starting point to refresh their application landscape.

contributors.headline: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead

projects.title: Nexus Taxea
projects.description:
In this project Bart Bovend'eerdt and I helped Nexus build their Taxea system. The system is method based and architected by Martin Helmer. We had great discussions on system design and project design.

The Nexus team augmented with the Ilionx team made the deadline and delivered.

contributors.headline: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead

projects.title: Flanders Make
projects.description:
As Senior researcher Software Integration Architect/Technical manager I'm involved in the project inception and execution.

Scope the project with the key stakeholders, analyse the business needs of the different labs and work with vendors to implement the necessary infrastructure. 

I3oT - Infrasctructure for Industrial IoT: this project aims to setup an IoT infrastructure for the different labs within Flanders Make. Enabling research in the area's of Closed online feedback loops, digital twins and process parameter optimization.

contributors.headline: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead

projects.title: IDesign assignment with Jarkko Kemppainen
projects.description:
In this assigment I had the opportunity to accompany Jarkko to the client gigRonin. 1 week of intensive architectural, business and leadership discussions.

Jarkko provided gigRonin with a clear insight on their current status and offered them several possible ways forward.

contributors.headline: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead

projects.description:
365 days of mobility aims to take away all the worries surrounding your mobility. Eg. regular car maintenance is a key part in this story.

In this project the architecture group did the initial investigation and scoping and Wouter Roos did the business architecture, software architecture and implementation with his team. 

This resulted in a nice application on budget, time and scope. A great experience and case for QAM and the IDesign method.

contributors.headline: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead

projects.title: OmniQStore
projects.description:
The customer is really interested in providing the best service possible for their customers and therefore started by optimizing their own internal way of working and monitoring the software quality.
My role is to investigate the project processes and see how this can be improved. The improvement steps are incorporated into a bigger plan in order to have a good balance between the resource investment for new feature vs the improvements.
 
For this assignment the QAM (internal QNH method) is used as guiding framework. After the initial investigation my role changed into executing the proposed improvements in the architecture, process and developement area's together with the team.

contributors.headline: Director Software Quality | Chief Architect | IDesign Process and Design Lead

projects.title: VanDerLande - Build Cell Controller (BCC)
projects.description: WPF Application for Baggage/ULD (Unit Load Device) information validation, loading and confirmation of a baggage transportation and loading system. The BCC communicates with several other network enabled components. Internal processing of the application uses the `Stateless´ platform for implementing state machine behaviour.

profile_positions.description:
I'm involved in multiple projects either as Architect, Advisor, Mentor, Consultant, Technical Manager, or Specialist.
I'm involved from the start of a project to maximize the likelihood of success. I focus on: Project Charter, Business Design, System Design, Project Design. 
XADM (ilionx application development method) is developed to align our architecture and development approach. The method is based on The Method of IDesign and incorporates industry best practices (EUP, TOGAF, Agile, DevOps). 
We successfully run a Software Development Factory.

My projects can be viewed in the projects section:
- Pharma Insight
- Arrow Resources
- Brainnet
- Additive Industries
- SucSez group
- Nexus - Taxea
- Nexus - Findea
- XADM - Ilionx application development method
- ValueMe
- Bloxs
- Circular Computing
- Flanders Make - I3oT
- IDesign assignment with Jarkko Kemppainen
- gigRonin

profile_positions.title: Chief Architect | Principal Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Solution architect for multiple mobile apps (internal and external facing) 
Solution architect for the platform supporting them, interconnecting and hosting all the services
Solution architect for the external facing web platform.
Some project are in the final phases of delivery and my role is shifted to mainly coach them through the last cycles. 
 
As a solution architect I am responsible for all technical aspects of the project: the architectural aspect, the process aspect and the technical aspect (Architecture, planning, design). 
 
During the project I am actively involved in design review, design and refinement sessions, demo’s, management updates, …. As well as having strategic sessions to look forward and see where the products need to be in the next months/years, with Product owners, management and other stakeholders.
 
I align with other architects of our company to streamline our products, project documentation and development processes.
 
I drive the platform thinking forward with the service catalogue and bringing PO’s together with mutual requirements. Consolidating these requirements and concerns on paper and prepare new initiatives based on this to present to management. An aspect of my role is aligning and standardizing the documentation landscape and processes within our organization. Strategic reuse on different levels is always on my mind.
 
At the start of a new project I’m involved in defining the scope, the initial architecture and the project design for the project.
For new products I fulfil the same responsibilities. 
 
Methods: Microservices, actor pattern, The IDesign Method, TOGAF, SDLC, RUP, EUP, continuous delivery, TDD
 
Technologies: C# .NET, Service Fabric, WebApi, Azure Mobile Sync, Azure Service bus, NoSQL, SQL, AAD, octopus , Azure API management, WCF ...
 
Social: Coaching
 
Courses: PDMC: IDesign Project Design Master Class
profile_positions.title: Software Architect

profile_positions.description:
Solution architect for multiple mobile apps (internal and external facing) and the platform supporting them.

As a solution architect I am responsible for all technical aspects of the project: the architectural aspect, the process aspect and the technical aspect. 
During the project I am actively involved in design and refinement sessions, demo’s, management updates, …. As well as having talks to look forward and see where the product needs to be in the next months/years, with Product owners, management and other stakeholders.
I align with other architects of our company to streamline our products, project documentation and development processes. 

Methods: Microservices, The IDesign Method, TOGAF

Courses: PDMC: IDesign Project Design Master Class
profile_positions.title: Software Architect

profile_positions.description:
Solution architect for a project that will serve +-60.000 end users worldwide.

As a solution architect I am responsible for all technical aspects of the project: the architectural aspect, the process aspect and the technical aspect. 
During the project I am actively involved in design and refinement sessions, demo’s, management updates, …. As well as having talks to look forward and see where the product needs to be in the next month's/years.
I align with other architects of our company to streamline our products. 
We have a mixed team with people from all over the globe: US, UK, South Africa, Romania, Canada, India, Australia, the Netherlands, Belgium, Germany…
I work closely together with architects and devs of our partner (Microsoft).

Methods: CQRS, Event Souring, Microservices, composite UI design, Test driven development, Peer2peer synchronisation, TOGAF, SOLID principles, Agile, SAFE, Domain Driven Design, TDD, BDD, Volatility based decomposition

Technologies: Web API, WPF, AngularJS, Signal R, Octopus, Azure, WCF

Courses:
Architect Master Class at IDesign, San Jose
profile_positions.title: Software Architect

profile_positions.description:
Team lead for a green field project that will serve +-60.000users world wide.

Active member of the core team that sets up the architectural runway, which is split up in an intentional part and an emergent part (agile architecture). With input from stakeholders of the business, infrastructure, support, end user, devs, testers and other projects this is constantly tweaked. 

Technologies/methods used: CQRS, Event Souring, Web API, WPF, Microservices, composite UI design, Test driven development, Peer2peer synchronisation, SOLID principles, Agile, SAFE, Domain Driven Design, AngularJS, Signal R, Octopus, Azure, TDD, BDD

We have a mixed team with people from all over the globe: US, UK, South Africa, Romania, Canada, India, Australia, the Netherlands, Belgium, Germany …

Participant at Microsoft Executive Briefing Centre Seattle and actively involved in the follow up sessions with architects from both parties. 
Speaker on the IITC SanFran

I attend on a regular basis conferences like:
DevIntersections
Techorama
profile_positions.title: Lead developer Global IT Services

profile_positions.description:
Team lead for a kanban bugfix process. 

Setup process and improve this process (standups, retrospectives, Team foundation server). 

Daily communication with our team members (international and on-site): product owners, business testers, product managers. 

Contact person for external partners: software benchmark firm, external vendors.

Analyse bugs and develop solutions for longstanding bugs.
